title: 1. FC Union Berlin - Wikipedia
snippet: This was already contrary to the original plan, which had envisioned only one football club per district. And the football department of TSC Berlin was only playing in the second tier DDR-Liga at the time. 1. FC Union Berlin was founded on the initiative of the powerful Herbert Warnke.

title: The Stadium's Holding Company Looks to the Future | 1. FC Union Berlin
snippet: FC Union Berlin e.V. themselves used their right and subscribed for 40,000 shares. It already held the majority of the shares in ‘An der Alten Försterei’ Stadionbetriebs AG with 6,847 shares. In addition, 900 other existing shareholders showed interest and applied for around 1,500 shares.

title: Union Berlin’s Stadium Holding Company Expands with 10,000 Shareholders and €30 Million Capital.
snippet: During this process, approximately 49,000 new shares were applied for. The club itself subscribed to 40,000 shares, reinforcing its majority ownership stake, which had already included 6,847 shares.

title: 1. FC Union Berlin football club - Soccer Wiki: for the fans, by the fans
snippet: Medium Name: U Berlin · Short Name: FCU · Year Founded: 1966 · Stadium: Alte Försterei (22,012) League: Bundesliga · Location: Berlin · Country: Germany · Manager · Steffen Baumgart · Age: 53 · None · Team Formation 3-5-2 ·

title: 1. FC Union Berlin - history and facts
snippet: 1906 FC Olympia Oberschöneweide is established (a forerunner to Union Berlin). 1945 The club is rebranded as SG Oberschöneweide. 1966 The club is established. 2001 First season in 2. Bundesliga. 2018 First season in Bundesliga. › Official website › Union Berlin on Wikipedia · References: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1._FC_Union_Berlin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SC_Union_06_Ber
